summary: genotype ON1 was first detected in canada in 2010/11. preliminary observations suggest a higher clinical severity in children infected. a higher clinical severity of RSV-A ON1 was observed within the group of children receiving PICU treatment. a higher clinical severity of RSV-A ON1 was observed within the group of children receiving PICU treatment. in other settings clinical severity of RSV-A ON1 and non-ON1 genotypes was mostly similar.
